kawi bundi | sasara bandi pem - [isuru abesekara] nogambauru diyata basa wimasanna gambaurata durata etherata yanna weralatha kumana pala pihinanna kshithijaya iwura nowa danaganna dam surakimda surakemu inma idin lathawemda etherata yamda hadin wimasanna hondin kan denna magin nawathinna nohaka danaganna siyal apa kalada mulawaki apada danan numbaa enna andura bindalanna nomin nanga yanna nonim duk kanda weren naha laba waren misa nomanda kawi bundi | bodhisathwa gabsawa - [kumara hettiaarachchi] nil mal bisaw ukule bim mal pipuni sandun suwanda mal gomara lama thorane manik karandu dethane ran kiri pirune andun tholin nahawena wadamal yahane owun athin morana daru gaba bindune ridi kandulumayi ran kothaleta pirune mahamayawarun ayi maha manga pipune wada palak natha bosathwaru sohone apagatha nowawu thaniwama mawuwarune [ruwan sakmana|1988] kawi bundi | mathaka - [damith udayanga dahanayaka] handa sulangak wage sarisaranawa obe mathakaya ma wate anduru ahumulu sahitha wiyali sithalaki aththe ee thula amathakaye mayima langa thaba bohomayak mathaka dawasin dawasa kalaya thallu karanawa ma anagathaya desata maha dukak nathi namuth golakara aakasaye indahita pathira yana la widuli eli wage sarisaranawa obe mathakaya ma wate.
